price: हरगिज़ नहीं! जब धरती कूट-कूटकर चूर्ण-विचूर्ण कर दी जाएगी।
arabic: كَلَّآۖ إِذَا دُكَّتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ دَكّٗا دَكّٗا

version.title: Hindi Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indian by Azizul-Haqq Al-Umary.

meta.transliteration: kallā idhā dukkati al-arḍu dakkan dakkan
